author: Staff Reporter
text:
Chief Minister N. Rangasamy handed over the appointment orders to the directly recruited primary teachers and Balasevikas on Wednesday morning in the auditorium of Mother Theresa Institute of PG & RI of Health Sciences, Gorimedu, Puducherry.

It was given to 393 primary teachers and 186 Balasevikas. Electricity and School Education minister T. Thiagarajan presided; Chief Secretary Manoj Parida, I.A.S., Secretary to Government (Education) G. Ragesh Chandra, I.A.S., and other officials were also present.
title: CM hands over appointment orders to teachers
